00030 #include "RegularStimulus.hpp"
00031 #include <cmath>
00032 #include <cassert>
00033 
00034 #include <iostream>
00035 
00036 RegularStimulus::RegularStimulus(double magnitudeOfStimulus, double duration, double period, double startTime, double stopTime)
00037 {
00038     assert(period > 0);
00039     assert(period >= duration);
00040 
00041     mMagnitudeOfStimulus = magnitudeOfStimulus;
00042     mDuration = duration;
00043     mPeriod = period;
00044     mStartTime = startTime;
00045     mStopTime = stopTime;
00046 
00047     //Swell duration to avoid rounding issues
00048     mDuration += period*DBL_EPSILON;
00049 }
00050 
00051 double RegularStimulus::GetStimulus(double time)
00052 {
00053     /*
00054      *  This covers a borderline case where start time is larger than period
00055      * and period divides start time, e.g. start_time=2 period=1.
00056      *
00057      * fmod() will return -0 in this case and will therefore switch the stimulus on.
00058      */
00059     if (time < mStartTime)
00060     {
00061         return 0.0;
00062     }
00063 
00064     double beatTime = fmod(time-mStartTime,mPeriod);
00065 
00066     if (beatTime >=0 && beatTime <= mDuration && time <= mStopTime)
00067     {
00068         return mMagnitudeOfStimulus;
00069     }
00070     else
00071     {
00072         return 0.0;
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00076 double RegularStimulus::GetPeriod()
00077 {
00078     return mPeriod;
00079 }
00080 
00081 double RegularStimulus::GetMagnitude()
00082 {
00083     return mMagnitudeOfStimulus;
00084 }
00085 
00086 double RegularStimulus::GetDuration()
00087 {
00088     return mDuration;
00089 }
00090 
00091 double RegularStimulus::GetStartTime()
00092 {
00093     return mStartTime;
00094 }
00095 
00096 void RegularStimulus::SetPeriod(double period)
00097 {
00098     mPeriod = period;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void RegularStimulus::SetStartTime(double startTime)
00102 {
00103     mStartTime = startTime;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void RegularStimulus::SetStopTime(double stopTime)
00107 {
00108     mStopTime = stopTime;
00109 }
